page.title: 10A DAY AT WECOCK SCHOOL
page.content: At 8.50a.m. the bell is rung in the playground. We go into school, put our coats in the cloakroom and go to our classrooms for registration. At 9.10a.m. there is Assembly in the Hall. At 9.30a.m. it is time for English work until playtime at 10.30a.m. After games in the playground it is Mathematics from 10.45a.m. until 12.00 noon. We have lunch either at home or in school, or a sandwich meal and then playtime until 1.10p.m. The afternoon session starts with registration and is followed by a variety of lessons,e.g. topic, science, craft, games, music, art, and computing. School finishes at 3.30p.m. We put up our chairs and go home.
